content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS ( SELECT  *
                FROM    sys.schemas
                WHERE   name = 'mipins' )
    EXEC('CREATE SCHEMA [mipins]');
GO

--CREATE VIEW FOR PERSONNEL AREA--

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW mipins.vw_mipins_hr_personnel_area
AS

SELECT DISTINCT

CASE 
    WHEN PersonnelAreaCode = 'P100' THEN 1
    WHEN PersonnelAreaCode = 'P200' THEN 2
    WHEN PersonnelAreaCode = 'P400' THEN 3
    WHEN PersonnelAreaCode = 'P250' THEN 4
    WHEN PersonnelAreaCode = 'P500' THEN 5
    WHEN PersonnelAreaCode = 'P600' THEN 6
    WHEN PersonnelAreaCode = 'P350' THEN 7
    WHEN PersonnelAreaCode = 'P300' THEN 8
    WHEN PersonnelAreaCode = 'P150' THEN 9 
    ELSE 'UNKNOWN'
END                     AS PersonnelAreaKey,
PersonnelAreaCode       AS PersonnelAreaCode, 
Description             AS PersonnelArea--,
--IsActive                AS IsActive,
--IngestionDate           AS IngestionDate,
--ValidTo                 AS ValidTo

FROM [odw_harmonised_db].[dbo].hr_personnel_area_dim

GO
